title: A Conversation with Chevy Chase with a screening of Christmas Vacation
description: Join us for an unforgettable evening of holiday cheer and laughs as we celebrate the timeless classic, National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation, with a special screening of the film followed by a live conversation and Q&A with Chevy Chase, and his wife Jayni. Chevy and Jayni will share their behind-the-scenes stories and personal anecdotes about the making of this beloved movie that has become a Christmas tradition. But the laughter doesn't stop there! We'll also be taking questions from the audience, giving you the chance to have your questions answered and hear firsthand from Chevy about his storied career including SNL, Caddyshack and so much more. Whether you're a die-hard fan or simply love the holiday spirit, this event promises to be an unforgettable experience for all. Mark your calendars, grab your ugly Christmas sweater, and join us for a night of laughter and holiday cheer with National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation and Chevy Chase!

title: K-Pop Demon Hunters Dance + Sing Along Party

title: Holiday Films Double Feature
description: Watch two movies for the price of one! Catch A Muppet Christmas Carol (1992) & The Nightmare Before Christmas (1993) back-to-back. Catch A Muppet Christmas Carol (1992): The Muppets' version of the Dickens holiday classic about a miser who's visited by three ghosts features Kermit the Frog as the penny-pincher's hardworking and loyal employee. The Nightmare Before Christmas (1993): Bored with the same old scare-and-scream routine, Pumpkin King Jack Skellington longs to spread the joy of Christmas. But his merry mission puts Santa in jeopardy and creates a nightmare for good little boys and girls everywhere.

title: Carolina Panthers v Tampa Bay Buccaneers
description: Bank of America Stadium was designed for fans of all ages. Please note that every child over the age of 12 months is required to have a game ticket to enter the stadium. Any child under the age of 12 months admitted without a ticket must share a seat with an accompanying adult. Please be aware that this event is subject to NFL flexible scheduling procedures. The date and time for some games may change from what is currently reflected on the schedule and from what may appear on the ticket. For more detailed information regarding scheduling for the 2025 NFL Season, please visit https://www.nfl.com/schedules/flexible-scheduling-procedures

title: Panthers VIP Tailgate v. Buccaneers at South Lawn Village
description: The Ultimate Tailgate Experience for the 2025-26 Panthers Season Located in South Lawn directly NEXT to Bank of America Stadium If you are a diehard Panthers fan and you want a VIP tailgating experience, check out the Panthers VIP Tailgate game day experience. Open three hours prior to kickoff for Panthers and opposing team fans. Come watch the ESPN pre-game breakdown All food and drinks (bar) are included in price All you can eat premium food stations exclusively created by Food Network Celebrity Chef Aaron May Live DJ Music Xbox gaming area inside the Panthers VIP tailgate

title: A Sainted Christmas Carol: Iced Scrooge
description: A Sainted Christmas Carol: Iced Scrooge Experience the magic of the holidays with Americas Got Talent Golden Buzzer finalists Sainted Trap Choir as they flip the Charles Dickens classic into a trap-soul celebration. A Sainted Christmas Carol: Iced Scrooge follows a cold-hearted music mogul whose love of money has frozen his heart. Through booming beats, soaring gospel harmonies and soul-stirring Black Christmas classics, Sainted reimagines a journey of redemption with swagger, spirit and undeniable groove. Expect dazzling vocals, live DJ energy and a Carolina night of joy, community and holiday heat you will never forget.

title: Registix Reserve Access NOT a Game Ticket - Buccaneers v Panthers
description: THIS IS NOT A GAME TICKET. A separate game ticket is required to enter the stadium before entering The Registix Reserve. Enjoy an all-inclusive bar with craft cocktails, beer, wine, and numerous culinary options with premium entrees, snacks, and desserts. Get as close to the action as possible from field-side access. Watch players warm up steps away in pregame and feel the pulse of all the action throughout the game. The Registix Reserve can be accessed from when stadium gates open until (60) minutes after the game's conclusion.
